description: Hacker News is a tech-focused news aggregator by Y Combinator, featuring user-submitted stories and discussions on startups, programming, and emerging trends

capabilities.name: HACKERNEWS_GET_FRONTPAGE
capabilities.description: Get the frontpage posts of Hacker News.

capabilities.name: HACKERNEWS_GET_ITEM_WITH_ID
capabilities.description: Get a specific item from Hacker News using its ID. Limits response size to prevent context overflow.

capabilities.name: HACKERNEWS_GET_LATEST_POSTS
capabilities.description: Get the latest posts from Hacker News based on optional filters. Results can be limited using the size parameter.

capabilities.name: HACKERNEWS_GET_TODAYS_POSTS
capabilities.description: Get today's posts from Hacker News.

capabilities.name: HACKERNEWS_GET_USER
capabilities.description: Get a specific user from Hacker News using their username.

capabilities.name: HACKERNEWS_SEARCH_POSTS
capabilities.description: Get relevant posts from Hacker News based on a full-text query and optional filters. Results can be limited using the size parameter.
